name: queasy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
feeling that you want to vomit: I started to feel queasy as soon as the boat left the harbour. Just the thought of blood makes me queasy.
feeling worried, unhappy, or uncertain about something: I'm queasy about giving such violent figures celebrity status. Her descriptions of extreme poverty and deprivation can give you a queasy feeling.
More examplesFewer examplesShe felt queasy because of her pregnancy.Those crab cakes made me queasy.People have this queasy feeling that fairground rides might be getting more unsafe.Many people are understandably queasy about animal experimentation.There are so many uncertainties at the moment, it's no wonder that investors are queasy. The tone of some of the comments made me a little queasy.
